committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Joint resolution to authorize and request the President to issue a proclamation designating the last week in August of each year as National Grade Crossing Safety Week.

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President to designate the last week in August of each year as "National Grade Crossing Safety Week."

titles.title: Joint resolution to authorize and request the President to issue a proclamation designating the last week in August of each year as National Grade Crossing Safety Week.
